Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving on highway from El Paso to Carlsbad, we saw a bright light that looked like a sign. As we got closed it started to change shapes. We finally were right next to it, I pulled to the side of the road. It was a reddish color. The light turned of as Jerry got out of the care to take a picture. A white fog started to approach us, so I left as soon is I could. Jerry and Tanya seen multi lights turning in a circle, Jerry started to take pictures and video. It stayed there for a moment then disappeared. All of us were scared, some were screaming.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Carlsbad

This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Seen multi lights, disapered, fog shot out, lights again.
